description:
From the first run to the last, this cozy jacket will help your little one forget about the weather. A seam sealed waterproof breathable shell offers all-day protection from the elements. Lined with multiple densities of efficient HeatSeeker™ insulation, warmth is focused where it's needed. When the heavens open or the wind kicks up, the insulated hood adds a layer of warmth. Plenty of pockets for snacks and daily necessities, plus a zippered sleeve pocket for ticket to ride.

  • Waterproof breathable DryVent™ 2-layer shell has been fully seam sealed for ultimate weather protection
  • Lined with a light and soft recycled polyester taffeta that feels great against the skin but has a low enough pile for easy layering
  • Heatseeker insulation is lightweight and efficient
  • Insulated 3-piece hood fits close to the head, staying in place when the wind picks up
  • Dual zippered hand pockets keep small necessities close
  • Single zippered pocket on the left sleeve is the perfect home for a lift pass
  • Powder skirt helps seal out the white stuff when the fresh tracks run deep
  • Adjustable cuffs keep the warm in and the cold out
name: The North Face Freedom Insulated Jacket - Girls' - Children to Youths
